page.title: 10Village Stores,Chapel Street
page.content: This shop is a Grocery and General Stores and an Off Licence.It re-opened in 1984 after being closed down for a while.Mrs Willett is their best customer.She is also our dinner lady at Steeple Bumpstead School.Five people work in the shop. Their best-selling sweet is Mars Bar, and their most popular ice-cream is Feast. The frozen food most in demand is Peas and the most purchased vegetable is Potatoes.Their busiest days are Wednesdays and Fridays.Their stock comes from Sudbury, Cambridge, Chelmsford, Castle Camps.We asked people why they thought a village shop was useful and we found out that the people who appreciate it are old people and people who have not got cars. We like the people because they are friendly and they know us. {. }
